title: Investment advisor certifications (RIA, IAR)
dataVerified: Advisor name, SEC/state registration number, ADV filing date, firm name, disciplinary history summary
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Registration status (ACTIVE/SUSPENDED/REVOKED). Link to SEC IAPD system (investors and compliance officers, public access)
rationale: Revocable credentials for investment advisors. Domain binding verifies SEC/state regulator. Prevents fake advisor credentials in investment fraud. Investor protection and client due diligence. Investment Adviser Public Disclosure (IAPD) integration. Critical for investor protection where advisor verification prevents fraud by unregistered or disciplined advisors.
